p: The safety and tolerability of VPM1002 has been assessed in a recently-concluded phase 2 trial of HIV-exposed and HIV-unexposed infants in sub-Saharan Africa (NCT02391415); data from this trial is awaiting public release. A phase 3 trial, comparing VPM1002 safety and efficacy to BCG in 10,000 South African infants is scheduled to begin in 2019, with completion targeted for 2021.
